title: WHen do you guys plan on gutting Morde now?

replies.body: Actually Morde is a bit weak. There would be no reason to nerf him in his current state. The problem is he lost a huge chunk of his sustain when spell vamp got gutted. So no, I think Morde is in a place where he can run a game if played properly but can also be punished if you play against him properly.

I could make a useful and detailed list of all the reasons of why morde was picked, and all the reasons for which he WASN'T picked in the rest of the games. Advantages and disanvantages, comparations to similar Champions, itemization posibilities and limitations, all of them arranged in a perfect grid pattern. 90 degree angles sumarising and interconecting the whole lot of mechanic and design phylosophies that work together to bring us this thing that we call "Mordekaiser". 

OR I can make fun of you for failing to understand the painful state in which morde as a champion as been for the last year and how this last picks are bringing back hope to his mains.

Hue

Decide for yourself what this means.
I love it when people correlate high pick rate - "oh he must be op" without actually analyzing anything about the champion as a whole
